dmca.title: ROLEX WATCH U.S.A., INC.
dmca.body:
en

-----Original Message-----
From: Gaf Counsel [mailto:gafcounsel@gibney.com] 
Sent: Friday, November 19, 2004 11:37 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; abuse@theplanet.com; admins@theplanet.com
Subject: RE: ROLEX WATCH U.S.A., INC.

November 19, 2004

BY EMAIL: copyright@theplanet.com; abuse@theplanet.com; admins@theplanet.com
AND FIRST CLASS MAIL
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
1333 North Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207
Attention: Lance Crosby, Esq. Chief Operating Officer

RE: ROLEX WATCH U.S.A., INC.

Dear Mr. Crosby:

        This firm is general counsel to Rolex Watch U.S.A., Inc. ("Rolex"),
the owners of the federally registered Rolex Trademarks: ROLEX, PRESIDENT,
SUBMARINER, YACHT-MASTER, DAYTONA, GMT-MASTER, DATEJUST and Crown Device
(among others).

        We are writing to request your assistance with the following web
sites hosted by your service that are selling counterfeit Rolex products.
The www.bluefakes.com, www.exclusivereplicas.com, www.fineluxurytime.com
www.goswissreplica.com, and www.upscalereplica.com websites offer
counterfeit and infringing Rolex watches for sale.  Such illegal use of the
Rolex Trademarks is likely to cause confusion and constitutes
counterfeiting, trademark infringement and dilution of Rolex's intellectual
property rights in violation of both federal and state laws.  This is also
in violation with ThePlanet.com's acceptable use policy, which states:

"Transmission, distribution, or storage of any information, data or material
in violation of United States or state regulation or law, or by the common
law, is prohibited. This includes, but is not limited to, material protected
by copyright, trademark, trade secret, or other intellectual property
rights"(emphasis added).

        As a result, we ask your voluntary assistance in removing these
websites, or requiring that the owners of these sites cease offering
counterfeit Rolex merchandise for sale.  As you may be aware, as the ISP for
these sites, ThePlanet.com may be held liable for contributory trademark
counterfeiting and infringement if, upon notice, you do not take action to
prevent the activity.  The penalties for such conduct are severe and may
include injunctive relief, actual damages, statutory damages of up to
$1,000,000 for each trademark that has been counterfeited, costs and
attorneys' fees. 

        In addition, as an ICANN accredited Registrar, you are required
under subsection 3.7.8 of ICANN's Registrar Accreditation Agreement ("RAA")
to take reasonable steps to investigate and correct any inaccuracy in the
contact information of the Registrants associated with www.bluefakes.com,
www.exclusivereplicas.com, www.fineluxurytime.com, www.goswissreplica.com,
and www.upscalereplica.com. This letter serves as notice that the
Registrants' contact information for www.bluefakes.com,
www.exclusivereplicas.com, www.fineluxurytime.com, www.goswissreplica.com,
and www.upscalereplica.com is inaccurate. 

        This letter also serves as notice regarding the illegal activities
of the above-referenced websites.  Your continued hosting of these sites
without ensuring that they have ceased the sale of counterfeit merchandise
is henceforth done with knowledge and, therefore, may constitute willful
contributory counterfeiting and trademark infringement.

        It is our desire to avoid legal proceedings against your service. We
therefore request that you provide us with the accurate contact information
for the Registrants associated with
www.bluefakes.com, www.exclusivereplicas.com, www.fineluxurytime.com,
www.goswissreplica.com, and    www.upscalereplica.com, in accordance with
Subsection 3.7.8 of the RAA.  We request this information, along with your
written assurance that you have either removed the offending web pages or
required the websites' owners to remove the illegal content from their
sites, before November 26, 2004.

        We thank you in advance for your cooperation and we await a response
from you or your counsel.

                                                        Sincerely,

                                                        Gibney, Anthony &
Flaherty, LLP


        

        
By:__________________________
                                                                John
Macaluso






s:/Internetgroup/00601/C&D/bluefakes-exclusivereplicas-goswissreplica-upscal
ereplica.doc

This message is intended only for the use of the individual or entity to
which it is addressed, and may contain information that is privileged
confidential and exempt from disclosure under applicable law. If the reader
of this message is not the intended recipient, or the employee or agent
responsible for delivering the message to the intended recipient, you are
hereby notified that any dissemination, distribution or copying of this
communication is strictly prohibited. If you have received this
communication in error, please notify us immediately by telephone, and
delete this message from your system. Thank you.
